title: RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Datasheet > RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12019 Ambient Light and Ultraviolet Light Sensor Overview
content: The RAK12019 is an Ambient Light sensor (ALS) or Ultraviolet Light Sensor (UVS), which is part of the RAKwireless WisBlock sensor series. The measured ambient light intensity and ultraviolet index are interfaced via the I2C bus making it immune to electrical noises, unlike its analog output counterpart. This module utilizes the LTR-390UV-01 sensor from Lite-On.
parent_content: The RAK12019 is an Ambient Light sensor (ALS) or Ultraviolet Light Sensor (UVS), which is part of the RAKwireless WisBlock sensor series. The measured ambient light intensity and ultraviolet index are interfaced via the I2C bus making it immune to electrical noises, unlike its analog output counterpart. This module utilizes the LTR-390UV-01 sensor from Lite-On.

title: RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Datasheet > RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12019 Mounting Mechanism on WisBlock Base
content:
**Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12019 module on a [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. The RAK12019 module can be mounted on the slots: **C, D, E, & F**.  
> **Image:** RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Mounting
parent_content:
**Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12019 module on a [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. The RAK12019 module can be mounted on the slots: **C, D, E, & F**.  
> **Image:** RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Mounting

title: RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Datasheet > RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Chipset > Vendor and Part Number Details [TABLE]

RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Datasheet > RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Module Pinout and Connector Details [TABLE]
content:
The RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Module comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12019 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 3**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- **I2C** related pin, **INT** pin, **3V3_S** and **GND** are connected to WisConnector  
> **Image:** RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Pinout
parent_content:
The RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Module comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12019 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 3**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- **I2C** related pin, **INT** pin, **3V3_S** and **GND** are connected to WisConnector  
> **Image:** RAK12019 WisBlock UV Sensor Pinout  
If a 24-pin WisBlock Sensor connector is used, the IO used for the output pulse depends on what slot the module is plugged in. The following table shows the default IO used for different slots:  
| SLOT C | SLOT D | SLOT E | SLOT F |
| ------ | ------ | ------ | ------ |
| WB_IO3 | WB_IO5 | WB_IO4 | WB_IO6 |
